business.headline: ICICI Prudential AMC IPO allotment today: Check status, GMP, expected share priceInvestors who applied for the IPO can check their allotment status through the registrar, Kfin Technologies, or the BSE website once the allotment is finalised.

100% FDI in insurance explained: What it means for your policies, premiums and claimsWhat does allowing 100% foreign investment in insurance really mean for you as a policyholder, and could it change your premiums, policy features or claim experience? Find out here.

China Eastern Airlines to run daily flights on Delhi-Shanghai route from JanuaryFlight services between the two countries were suspended following the Covid-19 pandemic in 2020 and were not restored due to the over four-year border face-off in eastern Ladakh, which ended in October last year.

Rupee hits historic low of 91 against US dollar. What's behind this drop?The rupee breached the 91 mark against the US dollar for the first time on Tuesday, extending its run of losses amid sustained foreign fund outflows and market uncertainty.

Missed the December advance tax deadline? This is the interest you may have to payIf you missed the December advance tax deadline, don't panic just yet. There is no direct penalty, but interest will apply. Here's what the Income Tax Act says and how much it may cost you.
Sensex ends 533 points lower, Nifty below 25,900; Axis Bank down 5%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 533.50 points to close at 84,679.86, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 167.20 points to end at 25,860.10.

India loses billions yearly as global finance favours rich nations: ReportPoorer and emerging economies like India consistently pay more to the global financial system than they receive back, while rich countries continue to benefit from lower costs and higher returns.​

Will your loan EMI fall? SBI cuts lending rates, lowers interest on select FDThe State Bank of India has announced reductions in both lending and select deposit rates, aiming to balance relief for borrowers with steady returns for most deposit holders.

Gifts from family are tax-free. But who exactly qualifies as 'family'?Received money or property from a family member and assumed it is tax-free? Do you know whether the Income Tax Act actually treats that person as 'family'? Let's find out.

ICICI Prudential AMC IPO GMP today. Check allotment and listing detailsThe trend in the unofficial market has strengthened as the ICICI Prudential AMC IPO moved closer to closing, supported by improving subscription numbers across investor categories.

How is young India really investing money? Hint: It's not just stocks or gadgetsFrom digital assets to experiences, India's younger generation is investing in ways that reflect changing priorities and lifestyles. Let's have a look.

Who is Meesho founder Vidit Aatrey, latest entrant to India's billionaire clubVidit Aatrey, the co-founder of Meesho Ltd, has entered the billionaire club as the company's shares climbed sharply to hit a fresh 52-week high in today's trade.

Income Tax Department flags fake donation claims, tightens checks on tax refundsSeveral taxpayers claimed refunds by showing fake donations to political parties and charitable institutions, often with the help of intermediaries. The Income Tax department has now warned that such practices are under close watch.

8th Pay Commission arrears to start from January 1, 2026? Here's latest updateIn November 2025, central government approved the terms of reference for the 8th Pay Commission and granted it 18 months to submit its report.
Sensex opens 300 points lower, Nifty below 26,000; Eternal down 3%The S&P BSE Sensex lost 381.44 points to 84,831.92, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 114.55 points to 25,912.75 as of 9:40 am.

ICICI Prudential IPO closes today: Should you bid as GMP crosses 10% gain?ICICI Prudential AMC IPO opened for bidding on December 12, 2025, and will close today, December 16, 2025. Share allotment is expected to be finalised on December 17, while listing on BSE and NSE is scheduled for December 19, 2025.

WPI inflation stays negative in November despite food price uptickGovernment data released on Monday showed Wholesale Price Index (WPI) inflation at (-) 0.32% in November, compared with (-) 1.21% in October.
India's exports jump 19% in November, trade deficit hits 5-month lowThe US remained India's largest export destination from April to November 2025, despite the imposition of a 50% tariff.

Sensex, Nifty rebound to end marginally lower as FII outflow troubles marketThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 54.30 points to close at 85,213.36, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 19.65 points to end at 26,027.30.

SBI reduces lending rates, EMIs likely to drop: Check new home loan ratesWith several major banks already passing on the benefit, SBI's move will directly help customers whose loans are linked to different lending benchmarks.

entertainment.headline: Dhurandhar box office Day 12: Ranveer Singh-film mints Rs 400 crore mark in India Ranveer Singh's Dhurandhar has crossed the Rs 400 crore mark in India on day 12, reaching a massive Rs 411.25 crore and continuing its unprecedented box office run.
Rolling Stones cancel 2026 tour, Keith Richards cites health concerns The Rolling Stones have cancelled their anticipated 2026 stadium tour of the UK and Europe.

Dileep's biggest career test: Can Bha Bha Ba deliver a post-acquittal comeback? Malayalam star Dileep faces a crucial career moment with Bha Bha Ba releasing on December 18 after his acquittal. The film's success could determine his comeback amid ongoing public controversies.

Barack and I were to meet Rob Reiner, Michele on the day they died: Michelle Obama Michelle Obama has revealed that she and former President Barack Obama were scheduled to meet Rob and Michele Reiner on the night the couple was found dead.

Ishaan Khatter's Homebound makes it to 2026 Oscar shortlist. Karan Johar thrilled Homebound, India's official entry, has been shortlisted among 15 films for the Best International Feature Film at the 98th Academy Awards. The film, directed by Neeraj Ghaywan and produced by Karan Johar, is now one step closer to Oscar final nominations.

From Khilji to Hamza: Dhurandhar Ranveer Singh's chameleon run in Bollywood Ranveer Singh shifts his shape into a new character with each film. Dhurandhar, directed by Aditya Dhar, stars him as Indian spy Hamza in Pakistan. His transformative role highlights the dedication of those protecting the country from the shadows.

Rob Reiner, wife Michele's throats were slit: New details emerge in murder case Police investigate fatal stabbing of filmmaker Rob Reiner and his wife Michele in Brentwood, Los Angeles, after their bodies were found by a family member. The couple's son, Nick, has been arrested in connection with the murders.

Reiner murders: Son Nick charged as District Attorney considers death penalty Los Angeles County District Attorney Nathan J Hochman has announced charges against Nick Reiner for the murders of his parents, Rob and Michele Reiner, following their discovery at their Brentwood home.

Saumya Tandon praises Ranveer's maturity: He's giving the stage to Akshaye Saumya Tandon discussed Ranveer Singh's role in the film Dhurandhar, calling attention to his mature approach as praise continues to center on Akshaye Khanna. The film has surpassed the Rs 400 crore mark across India.

Mehreen Pirzada denies secret wedding rumours, says she stayed silent for 2 years Mehreen Pirzada has denied reports alleging her secret marriage, criticised the spread of misinformation online, and called for greater accountability from digital platforms.

Raftaar chides college faculty for killing the vibe during live performance. Watch Rapper Raftaar called for a change in seating arrangements at a recent Mumbai college festival after faculty members in the front row dampened the crowd's energy, requesting that future events place students closer to the stage.

R Madhavan joins Dhurandhar meme fest comparing his performance with Akshaye Khanna R Madhavan highlighted fan comparisons of his role to Akshaye Khanna's performance in 'Dhurandhar' (2025) by re-sharing fan memes on social media.

Watch: Aryan Khan dodges paps, hides from cameras at Nirvan Khan's birthday Aryan Khan was seen avoiding cameras while attending Nirvan Khan's birthday celebration in Mumbai. Several videos of the director stepping out have emerged online.

Rajinikanth's Padayappa emerges as fifth highest-grossing re-release The restored version of the 1999 blockbuster Padayappa, starring Rajinikanth, recorded strong collections worldwide, emerging as one of the highest-grossing re-releases in Tamil cinema.

Shreya Dhanwanthary: I want to do films that destroy you emotionally Actor Shreya Dhanwanthary, in an exclusive interview with India Today, spoke about how screen time does not matter to her. She cited an example from The Family Man and said how it's a selfish thing to demand more time.

Vrusshabha trailer: Mohanlal steps into larger-than-life story of reincarnation The trailer of Mohanlal's magnum opus 'Vrusshabha' was unveiled in Kochi on Tuesday. Centred around the theme of reincarnation, the movie is positioned as one of 2025's most anticipated releases.

Shashi Tharoor urges Union Ministry to lift ban on 19 films at Kerala film festival Shashi Tharoor urged the Union Ministry to lift the ban on 19 films at the International Film Festival of Kerala (IFFK). He said that the arbitrary censorship diminishes India's cultural standing and risks stifling one of the nation's finest film celebrations.

Sholay The Final Cut: Does Gabbar's death in climax make it richer, 50 years on? Sholay: The Final Cut revisits its censored climax. Does Gabbar's death change the film's impact 50 years later, or does the legend remain intact?

Pradeep Ranganathan to return as director after Love Today, confirms producer Actor Pradeep Ranganathan is set to act and direct his upcoming project, marking his third collaboration with AGS after Love Today and Dragon.

general news.headline: US imposes complete travel ban on 7 more countries, limits entry from 15 othersThe new proclamation is an addition to earlier list of 19 countries, which faced either complete travel ban or partial entry restrictions. With the additions, the list has been expanded to as many as 39 countries and includes Palestinians and Syrians.

'Had ultimate control over nightclub's operations': Luthras being taken to GoaGoa Police, while seeking transit remand, said the Luthra brothers were the main owners of the nightclub, where a fire killed 25 people, and had 'ultimate control' over the operation and safety arrangement.

IPL 2026 auction report card: Rating the squads of all 10 teamsIPL 2026 mini-auction: Big money, bold calls and surprise steals defined the Abu Dhabi show, where all 10 teams finalised their squads after a series of fierce bidding wars on December 16. While some franchises splurged on marquee names, uncapped Indian players were also among the biggest winners as teams looked to strengthen their core. Here's how all 10 squads shaped up after an intense eight-hour auction marathon.

Ishaan Khatter's Homebound makes it to 2026 Oscar shortlist. Karan Johar thrilledHomebound, India's official entry, has been shortlisted among 15 films for the Best International Feature Film at the 98th Academy Awards. The film, directed by Neeraj Ghaywan and produced by Karan Johar, is now one step closer to Oscar final nominations.

Pak surrendered on Dec 16. So why does Bangladesh mark Independence Day in March?While India marks December 16 as Vijay Diwas to commemorate the defeat of Pakistani forces in the 1971 Bangladesh Liberation War, Dhaka celebrates March 26 as its Independence Day. It precedes the defeat of Pakistani forces by 10 months. So, what's the history and logic behind it?

At 329, Delhi air quality remains very poor, moderate fog predicted todayDelhi maintained its air quality in the very poor category on Wednesday morning at 329, with several monitoring stations recording AQI in the poor zone, according to the morning data of the Central Pollution Control Board.

Vrindavan Bankey Bihari's bhog, rest timings go haywire. Here's whyThe bhog offerings at Vrindavan's Banke Bihari Temple were delayed on Monday. The delay, lasting nearly 90 minutes, was blamed on the absence of the halwai. This came even as the Supreme Court expressed displeasure over the practice of paid "special pujas" that allegedly disrupted the deity's resting time.

4th T20I: Suryakumar, Gill under the pump as India eye series win in LucknowIndia will look to clinch the T20I series against South Africa in the fourth match in Lucknow on December 17. The spotlight will be once again on Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav's form as the team prepares for the T20 World Cup 2026 on home soil.

From Khilji to Hamza: Dhurandhar Ranveer Singh's chameleon run in BollywoodRanveer Singh shifts his shape into a new character with each film. Dhurandhar, directed by Aditya Dhar, stars him as Indian spy Hamza in Pakistan. His transformative role highlights the dedication of those protecting the country from the shadows.

New video shows Jewish couple confronting Bondi Beach gunman before attackFor Boris and Sofia Gurman, taking shelter like others was never an option. While bystanders sought refuge at a nearby bus stop, an undeterred Boris charged towards the attacker and tackled the shooter to the ground, attempting to snatch his rifle as his wife stood beside him.

Blinkit agent earns Rs 763 for 15 hours, Raghav Chadha flags 'exploitation'AAP MP Raghav Chadha, who recently raised the issue in Parliament, underscored that India cannot build a digital economy on the back of underpaid and overworked workers.

100% FDI in insurance explained: What it means for your policies, premiums and claimsWhat does allowing 100% foreign investment in insurance really mean for you as a policyholder, and could it change your premiums, policy features or claim experience? Find out here.

Messi goes desi: Football great prays, poses with tiger at Anant Ambani's VantaraVantara founder Anant Ambani hosted global football icon Lionel Messi at the wildlife rescue, rehabilitation and conservation centre, where the football legend's time was marked by guided tours, traditional rituals and close interactions with wildlife.

Shaw returns home to DC: Maharashtra batter reacts after IPL 2026 auction dealPrithvi Shaw posted an emotional message after the former India U-19 captain returned to his former side during the IPL 2026 auction.

After Jordan King, Ethiopian PM drives PM Modi in his car in special gestureAfter Jordan, Ethiopia's Nobel Peace Prize-winning Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed personally received PM Modi at Addis Ababa airport on Tuesday, drove him to his hotel, and made an unscheduled stop at the Science Museum and Friendship Park.

Watch: 5'2 Meloni's reaction to meeting 6'8 Mozambique President goes viralFootage shows her looking up at the Mozambican leader before breaking into a sheepish smile, with her expression suggesting surprise as the two posed for photographs. At one point, she also appeared to mutter a remark.

SHANTI Bill tabled: Your cheat sheet on India's biggest nuclear energy reformThe government tabled the Sustainable Harnessing and Advancement of Nuclear Energy for Transforming India (SHANTI) Bill, 2025 in the Lok Sabha, signalling a major overhaul of India's civil nuclear framework. The Bill aims to end the decades-long state monopoly on nuclear power and enable private sector participation.

Rob Reiner, wife Michele's throats were slit: New details emerge in murder casePolice investigate fatal stabbing of filmmaker Rob Reiner and his wife Michele in Brentwood, Los Angeles, after their bodies were found by a family member. The couple's son, Nick, has been arrested in connection with the murders.

Baseless: Defence Ministry denies private player's presence at Russia meetThe Defence Ministry on Tuesday called reports of private firms meeting Russian officials "baseless," clarifying the delegation included only ministry officials.

IPL 2026 auction review: 10 things we learnt from bidding wars in Abu DhabiIPL Auction: The Indian Premier League mini-auction saw a total of 77 players being sold on Tuesday. Here is a concise review of the event in 10 points. From trust in uncapped players to unique auction strategies, here's everything that unfolded in Abu Dhabi on December 15.

Trump imposes total blockade of oil tankers entering, leaving VenezuelaDonald Trump claimed oil from Venezuelan fields had been stolen and was being used to finance what he called drug terrorism, adding that the United States would no longer tolerate what he described as systematic theft and criminal activity.

Bondi shooter migrated from Hyderabad, family cut ties for marrying ChristianSajid Akram, one of the Sydney Bondi Beach shooters, migrated from Hyderabad in 1998, says Telangana Police. He had limited contact with his family in India and visited the country only six times in 27 years.

Why do H-1B visa applicants get 221(g) slips? US social media checks explainedThe US State Department expanded social media screening for skilled worker visas from December 15. Instead of an approval or rejection, applicants are now being issued a 221(g) slip.

sports.headline: 4th T20I: Suryakumar, Gill under the pump as India eye series win in Lucknow India will look to clinch the T20I series against South Africa in the fourth match in Lucknow on December 17. The spotlight will be once again on Shubman Gill and Suryakumar Yadav's form as the team prepares for the T20 World Cup 2026 on home soil.

IPL auction: Why uncapped Indian stars sold like hot cakes in Abu Dhabi The IPL 2026 auction saw teams deviate from their usual approach and splash the cash on uncapped Indian talent. With names like Prashant Veer and Kartik Sharma stealing the spotlight, here a look at why uncapped stars went for big money during the auction on December 16.

Ashes: Why Khawaja is playing after being left out of Xi on eve of 3rd Test Usman Khawaja was a late inclusion in Australia's playing XI for the third Ashes Test in Adelaide after Steve Smith was ruled out due to illness. Khawaja was slotted in to Smith's number four spot in the batting lineup.

IPL 2026 auction report card: Rating the squads of all 10 teams IPL 2026 mini-auction: Big money, bold calls and surprise steals defined the Abu Dhabi show, where all 10 teams finalised their squads after a series of fierce bidding wars on December 16. While some franchises splurged on marquee names, uncapped Indian players were also among the biggest winners as teams looked to strengthen their core. Here's how all 10 squads shaped up after an intense eight-hour auction marathon.

IPL 2026 auction review: 10 things we learnt from bidding wars in Abu Dhabi IPL Auction: The Indian Premier League mini-auction saw a total of 77 players being sold on Tuesday. Here is a concise review of the event in 10 points. From trust in uncapped players to unique auction strategies, here's everything that unfolded in Abu Dhabi on December 15.

MS Dhoni will surely retire: Ex-CSK teammate makes big claim after mini-auction IPL 2026 auction: Former CSK batter Robin Uthappa says MS Dhoni's final act is imminent, citing the franchise's youth-focused auction strategy as a clear sign of the legend's impending transition to a mentor role.

Forever grateful to Dhoni bhai, CSK: Pathirana's emotional note to Chennai Matheesha wrote an emotional message to CSK, MS Dhoni and fans of Chennai after the Sri Lankan pacer moved on to join KKR during the IPL 2026 auction on Tuesday, December 26. Pathirana spent four seasons with CSK.

If corporates, fans can pay for Messi, they can back Indian football: Bhaichung Speaking to India Today's Consulting Editor Rajdeep Sardesai, Indian football great Bhaichung Bhutia urged corporates and fans, who paid big money to watch Lionel Messi on his GOAT tour in India, to support Indian football.

IPL 2026 Auction: Meet Prashant Veer, The ₹14.20 Crore Uncapped Star Bought By CSK In this special report, RD INDIA TODAY speaks to Prashant Veer, the uncapped cricketer from Uttar Pradesh who created history at the IPL 2026 auction. The 20-year-old all-rounder was bought by Chennai Super Kings (CSK) for a staggering ₹14.20 crore. Prashant shares his excitement about joining his 'dream team' and the prospect of sharing the dressing room with MS Dhoni. He says, 'I am very excited to meet Dhoni. I will try to learn as much as I can from him.' He reflects on his journey from the UP T20 League, where he shone for Noida Super Kings, to becoming one of the most expensive uncapped players. He also credits his coach Raju Goyal and the UPCA for their support.

Messi goes desi: Football great prays, poses with tiger at Anant Ambani's Vantara Vantara founder Anant Ambani hosted global football icon Lionel Messi at the wildlife rescue, rehabilitation and conservation centre, where the football legend's time was marked by guided tours, traditional rituals and close interactions with wildlife.

Shaw returns home to DC: Maharashtra batter reacts after IPL 2026 auction dealPrithvi Shaw posted an emotional message after the former India U-19 captain returned to his former side during the IPL 2026 auction.

MS Dhoni fan Kartik Sharma in tears after fetching record Rs 14.2 crore from CSKMS Dhoni fan Kartik Sharma revealed that he broke down after seeing the bidding war for him during the IPL 2026 auction. Kartik became the joint-costliest uncapped player in the history of the IPL.

Suryakumar can win you 5 out 5 games alone: Dube backs out-of-form India captainAll-rounder Shivam Dube on Tuesday backed out-of-form India T20 captain Suryakumar Yadav, describing him as a player capable of winning matches single-handedly and insisting that his touch will return at the right time.

IPL auction: CSK reward Sarfaraz Khan's resilience, Delhi buy Prithvi ShawIPL 2026 auction: Sarfaraz Khan secured an IPL contract with Chennai Super Kings for Rs 75 lakh in the 2026 mini-auction. After missing out on the last two seasons, the Mumbai batter, who has worked hard on his fitness, will be back in the IPL.

Prashant Veer surprised with Rs 14.20 crore CSK deal: Didn't expect this muchIPL 2026: In an interview with India Today, Prashant Veer said that he was surprised after the Chennai Super Kings bought him for Rs 14.20 crore in the auction on Tuesday in Abu Dhabi.

Mustafizur Rahman shatters records, becomes most expensive Bangladesh player in IPLMustafizur Rahman made history at the IPL 2026 auction as Kolkata Knight Riders snapped him up for Rs 9.20 crore after a fierce bidding war, making him the most expensive Bangladeshi player ever and reinforcing his value as a proven match-winning T20 pacer.

Uncapped players rule IPL auction: Massive hikes for lesser-known facesIt was a field day for Prashant Veer and Kartik Sharma as CSK broke the bank to bring the uncapped stars home. Here's a look at the six players who saw an incredible price rise during the IPL 2026.

Prashant Veer exclusive: Mahi bhai's CSK pays this Yuvraj Singh fan Rs 14.2 croreIPL Auction 2026: Uttar Pradesh's Prashant Veer was signed by Chennai Super Kings for Rs 14.20 crore at the Indian Premier League auction held in Abu Dhabi on Tuesday. In an interview with India Today, Prashant spoke about his excitement at the prospect of playing alongside MS Dhoni and named Yuvraj Singh as his idol.

Paris St Germain ordered to pay Kylian Mbappe 60 million eurosParis St-Germain have been ordered by a French court to pay former striker Kylian Mbappe 60 million euros (£52.5 million) in unpaid salary and bonuses.

Jadeja 2.0? CSK buy uncapped Prashant Veer for record sum of Rs 14.2 croreIPL 2026 auction: Chennai Super Kings bought spin-bowling all-rounder Prashant Veer for Rs 14.20 crore, making him the joint-most expensive uncapped player in the history of the auction. They also spent Rs 14.2 crore for Rajasthan's Kartik Sharma.

New Dhoni in making? CSK make Kartik Sharma joint-most expensive uncapped playerCSK have identified their long-term replacement for MS Dhoni as they made Kartik Sharma the joint-most expensive uncapped player in the history of the IPL auction.

Who is Auqib Nabi? J&K all-rounder bags Rs 8.40 crore IPL deal with DCIPL 2026 Auction: Delhi Capitals bought Jammu and Kashmir all-rounder Auqib Nabi Dar for Rs 8.40 crore at the IPL 2026 auction, which is being held in Abu Dhabi on Tuesday.

Tata honours India women's world cup-winning team with Sierra carTata Motors honoured the Indian women's cricket team with Tata Sierra cars for their historic World Cup win. India registered their maiden World Cup triumph after beating South Africa by 52 runs in the final.

Delhi Capitals play it smart, buy David Miller and Ben Duckett at steal priceDelhi Capitals made key bargain buys by signing David Miller and Ben Duckett in the IPL 2026 auction. Miller became the first player to be sold at the auction for Rs 2 crore.

Venkatesh Iyer takes 70 percent pay cut, sold to RCB for Rs 7 croreIPL 2026 mini auction: Venkatesh Iyer and David Miller endured significant pay cuts in the auction. Royal Challengers Bengaluru outbid Kolkata Knight Riders to buy Venkatesh for Rs 7 crore in Abu Dhabi on Tuesday.

IPL Auction 2026 full list: Green, uncapped players bag record dealsIPL 2026 Auction: The accelerated round gathered momentum as Mustafizur Rahman, Rahul Tripathi and Jason Holder all found takers for healthy sums, adding depth and experience to their respective squads. While Cameron Green and Matheesha Pathirana continued to stand tall as the two costliest buys of the auction, the real talking point of the phase was the emergence of three uncapped Indian players, who turned heads with a field day at the bidding table.

Cameron Green is IPL's most expensive overseas playerCameron Green's name lit up the IPL 2026 auction room and the bidding followed. Kolkata Knight Riders outlasted Chennai Super Kings to land the Australian all-rounder for a record Rs 25.20 crore.

Abhigyan Kundu scripts history in Youth ODIs with 209 vs Malaysia in U19 Asia CupAbhigyan Kundu became only the second batter in Youth ODIs to score a double hundred when India and Malaysia locked horns in the U19 Asia Cup clash on Tuesday in Dubai.

Virat Kohli, wife Anushka visit Premanand Maharaj, video captures emotional momentVirat Kohli skipped the spotlight surrounding Lionel Messi's India tour. The former India captain instead visited Premanand Ji Maharaj in Vrindavan with wife Anushka Sharma for spiritual reflection.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
The power of knowledge: Education's influence on real estate market trendsIn a dynamic sector like real estate, investing in continuing education is not simply an option; it is a requirement.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
